description:
Options for the navigator series. Available options are the same as any series, documented at plotOptions and series.

Unless data is explicitly defined on navigator.series, the data is borrowed from the first series in the chart.

Default series options for the navigator series are:

series: {
    type: 'areaspline',
    fillOpacity: 0.05,
    dataGrouping: {
        smoothed: true
    },
    lineWidth: 1,
    marker: {
        enabled: false
    }
}

samples.name: Using a separate data set for the navigator

children.name: color
children.description: Sets the fill color of the navigator series.

children.name: data
children.description: Unless data is explicitly defined, the data is borrowed from the first series in the chart.

children.name: dataGrouping
children.description: Data grouping options for the navigator series.

children.name: dataLabels
children.description: Data label options for the navigator series. Data labels are disabled by default on the navigator series.

children.name: fillOpacity
children.description: The fill opacity of the navigator series.

children.name: lineColor
children.description: Line color for the navigator series. Allows setting the color while disallowing the default candlestick setting.

children.name: lineWidth
children.description: The pixel line width of the navigator series.

children.name: pointRange
children.description:
Since Highstock v8, default value is the same as default pointRange defined for a specific type (e.g. null for column type).

In Highstock version < 8, defaults to 0.

children.name: threshold
children.description: The threshold option. Setting it to 0 will make the default navigator area series draw its area from the 0 value and up.

children.name: type
children.description:
The type of the navigator series. Defaults to areaspline if defined, otherwise line.

Heads up: In column-type navigator, zooming is limited to at least one point with its pointRange.
